articles.title: India embracing electric vehicles? Vehicle manufacturers shifting to EVs | World English News | WION - WION
articles.description: Many vehicle manufacturers in India are shifting to EVs. A report suggests that India's EV market will grow by 90% by 2030. Watch this special ground report ...
